name: Preksha Gulati

current_company.name: Golden Gate Ventures
current_company.title: NUS Business School | Golden Gate Ventures | Gruhas | CFA Level II Passed

experience.title: Investments
experience.description: Gruhas is an India-focused venture capital fund founded by Nikhil Kamath and Abhijeet Pai. The fund specializes in early-stage, venture, and debt investments, with a primary focus on the prop-tech, clean-tech, media & entertainment, and consumer sectors.
experience.description_html: Gruhas is an India-focused venture capital fund founded by Nikhil Kamath and Abhijeet Pai. The fund specializes in early-stage, venture, and debt investments, with a primary focus on the prop-tech, clean-tech, media & entertainment, and consumer sectors. <!---->

experience.title: Finance and Strategy at CFOs Office
experience.description: -Provided strategic support to the CFO via in-depth research, through implementation of robust MIS, optimized budgeting, and crafted calculators to drive impactful decision-making, leading to 30% reduction in variable costs and revision of revenue charges per square feet-Crafted a comprehensive business plan and pitch deck showcasing revenue model, economic indicators, growth prospects, and strategic pathways, securing substantial debt and formed a strong foundation for future equity financing-Maintained continuous communication of performance updates with senior management, clients, and investors through quarterly presentations to support future planning
experience.description_html: -Provided strategic support to the CFO via in-depth research, through implementation of robust MIS, optimized budgeting, and crafted calculators to drive impactful decision-making, leading to 30% reduction in variable costs and revision of revenue charges per square feet-Crafted a comprehensive business plan and pitch deck showcasing revenue model, economic indicators, growth prospects, and strategic pathways, securing substantial debt and formed a strong foundation for future equity financing-Maintained continuous communication of performance updates with senior management, clients, and investors through quarterly presentations to support future planning

experience.title: Investment Research & Advisory
experience.description: -Worked on buy-side/sell-side mandates, performed company and industry research using third-party databases; assisted clients in buyer/target identification; prepared company profiles and pitch decks, conducted benchmarking analysis on various financial and operational parameters; computed valuation using trading and transaction comps-Worked on multiple equity research and business valuation projects, including ICRs, quarterly reviews, flash reports, sector updates, valuation models (DCF, LBO, SOTP, Comparable) and financial statement analysis
experience.description_html: -Worked on buy-side/sell-side mandates, performed company and industry research using third-party databases; assisted clients in buyer/target identification; prepared company profiles and pitch decks, conducted benchmarking analysis on various financial and operational parameters; computed valuation using trading and transaction comps-Worked on multiple equity research and business valuation projects, including ICRs, quarterly reviews, flash reports, sector updates, valuation models (DCF, LBO, SOTP, Comparable) and financial statement analysis

experience.title: Client Success Analyst
experience.description: -Managed post-sales account management and communication for 14+ B2B clients, developed strategies to increase product adoption and utilization, forecasted and tracked key account metrics on a monthly/quarterly basis-Liaised with 7 different product teams and business disciplines to customize offerings as per client requirements and provide the core team with the presentations and data reports addressing product issues/concerns to maintain and strengthen trust and relationships with users-Headed customer support, resolved 100+ queries/issues/request across 250+ Universities in USA, UK, Asia and Australia. Conducted root cause analysis on issues and feedback, suggested improvements to increase engagement and satisfaction; streamlined and automated customer support process with the introduction of chatbot with improved user interface

Conducted root cause analysis on issues and feedback, suggested improvements to increase engagement and satisfaction; streamlined and automated customer support process with the introduction of chatbot with improved user interface
